name: Trash Day 2 - Garbage Runner
description:
Johnny the Garbage man in back! He and his partner JJ have picked up all the trash in your neighborhood and are headed to the dump, but the road is pretty bumpy and some of the trash has spilled. Help Johnny chase after his Garbage Truck, collecting as much garbage as possible - but watch out for traffic!

Trash Day 2 - Garbage Runner uses simple 1-touch controls to make Johnny jump to collect trash and avoid traffic. This is a fun and zany game that every fan of Garbage day will enjoy.
